data.text: @brienmcmullen @Jeff_45_47_ @TheLeoTerrell Oh Brien, I flew out of Dulles in DC last night, headed to Sacramento. 80% of the passengers were Afghan refugees. I had to wear a mask on the plane.. Guess who DIDNT?  It isn’t xenophobic to point out the inconsistency in a situation.

@nghkeepmoving @pugbandit @mmpadellan Just saw another video of a man who took his mask of after he got seated on plane. He were asked to leave. The guying started ranting, "You only gave me one warning" over & over. 😔  NO, HE WAS INFORMED when he bought his ticket & at the gate. Nobody should have to tell him again

@NaomiFutch @ABC I agree, IF the law gives you the right to choose than choose! I wish my children did not have to wear a mask at school or on a plane BUT if the Law says we have to, we will. Travelling with a mask doesn’t mean just Canada it means the world wide.
@MahGill @UDawgfan1967 @davenewworld_2 @realTuckFrumper I wouldn’t have wanted to fly with him on the plane. If he flips out about something like a mask, it’s hard to tell what else he might do.

those two deserve each other, and to be on every no-fly list.

RT @BigHeadDave: @katherineOma @VoteBlue4Us If I see someone on a plane with no mask, I’ll be suing them for… $10,000. 

There’s precedent,…
@RepDeanPhillips wear your mask and you are protected from everything but a plane crashing on your head. so why push others when you are SAFE? or do you not believe the "masks protect you" line?

but how do you book a flight, plan a trip, get to the airport, get ON the plane and then act surprised you have to wear a mask on the plane? you knew since you booked like did you think they would just ignore you this time?

If they have a fit over masking on a plane. Put them on a no flight list. 

If parents not going to have their child wear a mask to school. Expel the student and have parents homeschool.

Consequences. https://t.co/vob0MmGYHz

@JoeNewberry I flew from CLT to AUS last Sunday, no mask issues on plane  … but a First Class Passenger groped a Flight Attendant, thought he got away with it too … was surprised Police escorted him off plane in AUS. … 🤣
